name: Windows Meterpreter (Reflective Injection), Windows x86 Bind Named Pipe Stager

UserExistsError
description:
Inject the Meterpreter server DLL via the Reflective Dll Injection payload (staged). Requires Windows XP SP2 or newer.

Listen for a pipe connection (Windows x86)
